name: Fox Jump (Infamoustooth37)
description:
This is my first 2D platform game which I am currently developing.  It is in development so take that in mind but the basic game (V1.6) should give you an idea of where this game may be headed in the future

This game is still in heavy development as well as being my first game I made to high a standard.

You will also realise that the game doesn't have any levels (for now) so just take that into account when trying it out.

Feedback is greatly appreciated as well as any feature requests.

I hope you enjoy it and make sure to look out for further builds.

This was made using : (Unity asset store link)

Assets from Ansimuz 

(https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/sunny-land-103349)

Sound effects:

Sound FX - Retro Pack by Zero rare

(https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/sound-fx-retro-pack-121743)

Footsteps (snow and grass) by MGWSoundDesign

(https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/footstep-snow-and-grass-906...)
